## Introduction

Follow along at [git.io/vSi6a](https://git.io/vSi6a)

R packages for this talk:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages(
  c("pageviews", "WikipediR", "WikidataR",
    "WikidataQueryServiceR"),
  repos = c(CRAN = "https://cran.rstudio.com")
)
```
